title: New: Jamie Isaac – Wash
body:
It’s been over a month since we last heard from teenage sensation **Jamie Isaac**, which by his prolific standards, is too long.

Having played his debut live show in London last week, which (my sources tell me) went down a treat, **Isaac** has dropped a new track in the form of _Wash_. An ambient inspired number, keeping the vocals to a bare minimum thus allowing each word to gain far greater relevance, it’s another stunning progression of his ever-developing sound. Now with six tracks under his belt, **Jamie Isaac** is well and truly beginning to establish a name for himself, and it’s surely only a matter of time before the offers come calling. Stream _Wash_ below.

_Over me? say it quietly my sweet_  
_And why can’t I feel your face? your washing over my escape._
